name: Nightmare (itch) (Bergros Gigja, bjarkifreyr95, Allifreyr, irisdogg)
description:
Nightmare (itch) (Bergros Gigja, bjarkifreyr95, Allifreyr, irisdogg) is an action-shooter game developed by Bergros Gigja, irisdogg and Allifreyr. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Nightmare (itch) (Bergros Gigja, bjarkifreyr95, Allifreyr, irisdogg) on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
